title: WhyFhy
author: WhyFhy
content: I'm posting on behalf of a tech warehouse team that's in the market for some tech themed apparel and promotional items. They don't have a specific brand or theme in mind, but they particularly interested in items that showcase projects or concepts related to coding, 3D Printing, bitcoin, ai, or blockchain. (Anything Niche and nerdy related to tech)They're looking for unique, artistically designed items that the team would be proud to wear and use. Think of it as a real-world ramping opportunity for your brand or style to gain some recognition. In return, they'll be walking billboards for your designs, giving your work exposure to a wider audience.This is an opportunity for em to delve deeper into their ideal clients with pertinent content, and for you to get your designs out there in the world. If you're an artist, a designer, or a brand that aligns with these themes, I'd love to hear from you.If you're interested or want more details, feel free to PM me.Clients are not asking for free stuff, they will pay, however it must be pertinent content. This is also an opportunity to potentially use them as a vendor.

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: www.cryptocloaks.com (the company I work for) has some apparel that is both Bitcoin and 3d printing related.

comments.author: WhyFhy
comments.body: Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on June 07, 2023, 04:08:15 PMwww.cryptocloaks.com (the company I work for) has some apparel that is both Bitcoin and 3d printing related. poked around, interested maybe you can get us in contact with some more favorable pricing ?What about your company?!
